translated: “The great explanations” are the sūtras that are the explanations of other sūtras.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i zhes pa byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can gyi don du'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i zhes pa byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can gyi don du'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas were taught for the sake of the bodhisattvas.

original: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud kyi //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud kyi //
translated: The tantras of yoga and yoginī

original: zhes pa dang po'i don la drug pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa dang po'i don la drug pa'o //
translated: are for the sake of the first.

original: sangs rgyas spyod yul zhes pa sems can gyi dbang du byas nas zhes pa lhag ma ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyod yul zhes pa sems can gyi dbang du byas nas zhes pa lhag ma ste /
translated: The domain of the buddhas is for the sake of sentient beings.

original: 'di sangs rgyas kho na'i spyod yul du gyur pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di sangs rgyas kho na'i spyod yul du gyur pa zhes pa'o //
translated: This is the domain of the buddhas alone.

original: 'di dag gis shes rab chen po'i don gyi phyir sngags kyi tshul bstan to zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di dag gis shes rab chen po'i don gyi phyir sngags kyi tshul bstan to zhes gsungs so //
translated: These teach the way of mantra for the sake of great wisdom.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sems nyid rnam dag tu gsungs pa //🔽theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid che //
analyzed: sems nyid rnam dag tu gsungs pa // theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid che //
translated: The mind itself is taught to be pure.🔽It is the nature of the Great Vehicle,

original: sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul lo //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul lo //
translated: The domain of the great being.

original: zhes pa dang gzhan du yang /🔽don gcig na'ang ma rmongs dang // thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang // shes rab chen pos dbang byas phyir //
analyzed: zhes pa dang gzhan du yang / don gcig na'ang ma rmongs dang // thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang // shes rab chen pos dbang byas phyir //
translated: And elsewhere:🔽Even if the meaning is the same, the mantra vehicle is superior

original: sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags //
translated: Because it is not confused, has many methods, is not difficult,🔽And is governed by great wisdom.

original: zhes so // ngo mtshar ba bstan pa 'di gang la zhe na /
analyzed: zhes so // ngo mtshar ba bstan pa 'di gang la zhe na /
translated: What is this teaching of the marvelous?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / bsod nams dman pa zhes pa ste //
analyzed: gsungs pa / bsod nams dman pa zhes pa ste //
translated: For those of little merit.

original: bsod nams dman pa'i sems can rnams kyang rim gyis 'dul ba la nye bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams dman pa'i sems can rnams kyang rim gyis 'dul ba la nye bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The thought is that even sentient beings of little merit will gradually become disciplined.

original: yang na bsod nams dman pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du sngags kyi theg pa lha'i rnam pa tsam gyis bdag nyid bstan te /
analyzed: yang na bsod nams dman pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du sngags kyi theg pa lha'i rnam pa tsam gyis bdag nyid bstan te /
translated: Or, for the sake of sentient beings of little merit, the mantra vehicle is taught by the mere form of the deity.

original: lha'i rnam pa la brten nas /
analyzed: lha'i rnam pa la brten nas /
translated: Based on the divine form,

original: chos kyi sku la sogs pa bsgom zhing de la brten nas stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs zung du 'jug pa bsgom zhes pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi sku la sogs pa bsgom zhing de la brten nas stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs zung du 'jug pa bsgom zhes pa ste /
translated: one should meditate on the Dharma Body, etc. and based on that, one should meditate on the union of wisdom and means, which is the nature of emptiness and compassion.

original: 'di dag gi sngags kyi tshul la bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa rang bzhin rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can gyis la ma rim pa gnyis rab tu bstan to //🔽'di yang / myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di dag gi sngags kyi tshul la bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa rang bzhin rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can gyis la ma rim pa gnyis rab tu bstan to // 'di yang / myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur //
translated: In this [system], the two stages of the Mantra system, the creation stage and the perfection stage, which have the nature of cause and effect, are fully taught.🔽And this [system] is said to be the attainment of Buddhahood quickly.

original: zhes pa brtson 'grus dang ldan na skye ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa brtson 'grus dang ldan na skye ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one has diligence, one attains Buddhahood in this very life.

original: rab gnas kyi zhu ba'i lan gdab pa'i phyir gsungs pa /🔽de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽rab gnas kyi zhes pa rab gnas la ste /
analyzed: rab gnas kyi zhu ba'i lan gdab pa'i phyir gsungs pa / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o // rab gnas kyi zhes pa rab gnas la ste /
translated: In order to answer the question about consecration, [the Bhagavān] declares,🔽Then, the Bhagavān, having been asked by the Bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi, said to the Bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi, Vajrapāṇi, listen!🔽 Consecration means consecration.

original: cho ga'i pha rol son zhes pa cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga'i pha rol son zhes pa cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Having perfected the rite means having completed the rite.

original: las bcu zhes pa chu la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams te /
analyzed: las bcu zhes pa chu la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams te /
translated: The ten actions are the consecrations of water and so forth.

original: slob ma dbang bskur ba la ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du sku gzugs la'ang bya'o zhes pa'i don to //🔽skye bo tshim na rgyas pa ste //
analyzed: slob ma dbang bskur ba la ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du sku gzugs la'ang bya'o zhes pa'i don to // skye bo tshim na rgyas pa ste //
translated: The meaning is that just as the disciple is consecrated, so also the image.🔽When people are satisfied, there is prosperity.

original: zhes pa skye po @73b tshim pas sku gzugs rgyas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes pa skye po @73b tshim pas sku gzugs rgyas par 'gyur te /
translated: When people are satisfied, the image prospers.

original: shugs kyis yon bdag gi yang ngo //
analyzed: shugs kyis yon bdag gi yang ngo //
translated: By implication, so also the patron.

original: sku gzugs rgyas pa las cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: sku gzugs rgyas pa las cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens from the prosperity of the image?

original: gsungs pa / rgyas pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / rgyas pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said, “From prosperity,” and so forth.

original: bkra shis bcas las zhes pa rab gnas kyi dus su bkra shis nye bar bsgrubs pa las de'i zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bkra shis bcas las zhes pa rab gnas kyi dus su bkra shis nye bar bsgrubs pa las de'i zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From the rite of auspiciousness, at the time of consecration, there is peace from the accomplishment of auspiciousness.

original: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens from that?

original: gsungs pa / zhi ba'o zhes ti zhi ba zhes pa ji srid bsrung ba dang phyir bcos pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / zhi ba'o zhes ti zhi ba zhes pa ji srid bsrung ba dang phyir bcos pa zhes pa'o //
translated: It is said, “Peace,” which is protection and restoration.

original: gang gi phyir smod pa'i rnal 'byor zhes pa smad pa'i sbyor ba las te smad pa la sogs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba las zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir smod pa'i rnal 'byor zhes pa smad pa'i sbyor ba las te smad pa la sogs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba las zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because of the yoga of contempt, that is, from the application of contempt, from the application of disparagement, and so on.

original: nyer 'tshe sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung //
analyzed: nyer 'tshe sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung //
translated: Various harms and sufferings arise.

original: zhes pa nye bar 'tshe ba dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs te /
analyzed: zhes pa nye bar 'tshe ba dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs te /
translated: Various harms and sufferings means

original: sku gzugs kyi sdug bsngal ni gcod pa dang bshig pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gzugs kyi sdug bsngal ni gcod pa dang bshig pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: the suffering of the body, such as cutting and destroying,

original: nye bar 'tshe ba ni me dang chu la sogs bas so //
analyzed: nye bar 'tshe ba ni me dang chu la sogs bas so //
translated: and the harm of fire, water, and so on.

original: de la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
translated: The procedure for that is as follows:

original: gsungs pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram thang sku'i dkyil 'khor du sku gzugs la sogs pa stong pa nyid du byas pa'i rjes la ji lta ba bzhin bskyed de /
analyzed: gsungs pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram thang sku'i dkyil 'khor du sku gzugs la sogs pa stong pa nyid du byas pa'i rjes la ji lta ba bzhin bskyed de /
translated: In the maṇḍala of colored powder or the maṇḍala of cloth, having made the form of the deity empty and so on, generate it as before.

original: dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs thugs kar sa bon dang bcas pa rnam par bsams nas /
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs thugs kar sa bon dang bcas pa rnam par bsams nas /
translated: Having visualized the form of the pledge being with the seed syllable at the heart,

original: gos gsar pa dmar po la sogs pas brgyan pa /
analyzed: gos gsar pa dmar po la sogs pas brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with new red cloth, and so on,

original: me tog dang bcas pa'i yon bdag gis de'i me tog phreng ba'i mtha' nas bzung ba byas nas dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i bdag nyid can du byug pa byed du bcug ste /
analyzed: me tog dang bcas pa'i yon bdag gis de'i me tog phreng ba'i mtha' nas bzung ba byas nas dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i bdag nyid can du byug pa byed du bcug ste /
translated: The patron, together with the flowers, should hold the end of the flower garland and be anointed with the identity of seeing the mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi shar ram dbang ldan gyi mtshams su mi ring bar stegs bu gru bzhi pa dpangs su khru gnyis pa'i 'jim pa'i rang bzhin nam ;
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi shar ram dbang ldan gyi mtshams su mi ring bar stegs bu gru bzhi pa dpangs su khru gnyis pa'i 'jim pa'i rang bzhin nam ;
translated: Not far from the east or northeast of the mandala, on a square platform two cubits high, made of clay,

original: ji ltar gnas pa'i sa 'am byug pa la sogs pa byas pa'i dbus su sna chogs chu skyes nub tu sgo dang khru bzhi pa re kh'a gcig gis bskor ba bris te /🔽bla re la sogs pas brgyan pa /
analyzed: ji ltar gnas pa'i sa 'am byug pa la sogs pa byas pa'i dbus su sna chogs chu skyes nub tu sgo dang khru bzhi pa re kh'a gcig gis bskor ba bris te / bla re la sogs pas brgyan pa /
translated: or on the ground as it is, or anointed, and so on, draw a multicolored lotus with a door in the west, surrounded by a single line, four cubits in size.🔽It is adorned with canopies and so on.

original: sil snyan dang glu la sogs pa mdun du byas shing spras pa /
analyzed: sil snyan dang glu la sogs pa mdun du byas shing spras pa /
translated: It is filled with cymbals, songs, and so on.

original: de'i dbus su shing stan gyi dbus su bris pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad la bsgoms pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa bzhag nas /
analyzed: de'i dbus su shing stan gyi dbus su bris pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad la bsgoms pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa bzhag nas /
translated: In the center of that, in the center of a wooden seat, place the image, and so on, on an eight-petaled lotus, upon a moon mandala visualized in the center.

original: mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /🔽las thams cad pa'i sngags dang h'um yig gis kyang lan bdun bzlas shing /
analyzed: mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas / las thams cad pa'i sngags dang h'um yig gis kyang lan bdun bzlas shing /
translated: Having first offered water for the feet, etc.,

original: g-yas pa dang cig shos @74a * //
analyzed: g-yas pa dang cig shos @74a * //
translated: one should purify with the mantra of all activities and the syllable HŪṂ, and🔽one should hold the right and left fists

original: kyi khu tshur dag gis bzung la so sor lan gnyis kyis g-yon skor du /
analyzed: kyi khu tshur dag gis bzung la so sor lan gnyis kyis g-yon skor du /
translated: and turn to the left twice each,

original: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sarbba satva sya sarbba p'a pam da ha na sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sarbba satva sya sarbba p'a pam da ha na sv'a h'a /
translated: reciting OṂ SARVA PĀPAM DAHA VIHARA SVĀHĀ.

original: zhes brjod cing sbyangs te don grub me la dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod cing sbyangs te don grub me la dor bar bya'o //
translated: One should throw it into the fire of Amoghasiddhi.

original: de bzhin du g-yas skor gyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yas skor gyis so //
translated: In the same way, one should turn to the right.

original: de bzhin du chu yang g-yon dang g-yas su yongs su bskor zhing de ltar dkar rtsis yongs su byugs pa'i kham phor bzhi dang / d'ur ba'i myu gu dang bcas pa'i ba'i lci ba'i chang bu dang zan gyi chang bu dang / nya lcibs kyang yongs su bskor zhing sa la gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du chu yang g-yon dang g-yas su yongs su bskor zhing de ltar dkar rtsis yongs su byugs pa'i kham phor bzhi dang / d'ur ba'i myu gu dang bcas pa'i ba'i lci ba'i chang bu dang zan gyi chang bu dang / nya lcibs kyang yongs su bskor zhing sa la gzhag par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should turn the water to the left and to the right, and in the same way, one should place on the ground the four bowls anointed with white clay, and the ball of cow dung together with the sprout of barley, the ball of food, and the fish entrails, turning them.

original: me la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: me la ni ma yin no //
translated: But not into the fire.

original: de nas lag pa dag gis sku gzugs la sogs pa la nye reg byas la /
analyzed: de nas lag pa dag gis sku gzugs la sogs pa la nye reg byas la /
translated: Then, having touched the image with one's hands,

original: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi sngags kyis dri la sogs pa byug par rung na dri yis byug cing mi rung na me long gi gzugs brnyan la'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi sngags kyis dri la sogs pa byug par rung na dri yis byug cing mi rung na me long gi gzugs brnyan la'o //
translated: if it is suitable to anoint it with perfume, etc., anoint it with perfume, and if it is not suitable, then anoint the reflection in a mirror.

original: de'i spyi bor me tog gi phreng ba dkris te mdun du mchod yon phul nas /
analyzed: de'i spyi bor me tog gi phreng ba dkris te mdun du mchod yon phul nas /
translated: Having placed a garland around its head and offered water for welcoming in front,

original: mar mes yongs su bskor la /
analyzed: mar mes yongs su bskor la /
translated: surround it with lamps,🔽and fumigate it with incense of white and red sandalwood, which has been enchanted seven times with the all-activity [mantra] and the syllable HŪṂ.

original: las thams cad pa dang h'um yig gis kyang lan bdun bzlas pa'i spos dkar dmar dang bcas pa'i bdug spos bdug par bya'o zhes pa byur bsal bar byas nas zho dang 'o ma dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra zhes pa bdud rtsi lnga rnams zangs kyi
analyzed: las thams cad pa dang h'um yig gis kyang lan bdun bzlas pa'i spos dkar dmar dang bcas pa'i bdug spos bdug par bya'o zhes pa byur bsal bar byas nas zho dang 'o ma dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra zhes pa bdud rtsi lnga rnams zangs kyi
translated: Having thus removed the covering, one should offer the five nectars: curd, milk, ghee, honey, and sugar,

original: snod du bsres pa dang / de'i rjes la zho dang 'o ma dang mar dang ba'i lci ba dang ba'i chu rnams de kho na ltar zangs kyi snod du bzhag pa las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i d'ur ba'i chun po blangs pa rnams kyis /
analyzed: snod du bsres pa dang / de'i rjes la zho dang 'o ma dang mar dang ba'i lci ba dang ba'i chu rnams de kho na ltar zangs kyi snod du bzhag pa las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i d'ur ba'i chun po blangs pa rnams kyis /
translated: From all of them, take a portion of water enchanted with the all-activity [mantra] and with the five nectars,🔽Om hum tram hrīḥ āḥ.

original: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes pa sngar bzhin rung ba dang mi rung bas rab tu byugs te /
analyzed: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes pa sngar bzhin rung ba dang mi rung bas rab tu byugs te /
translated: As before, apply the appropriate and inappropriate [substances].

original: las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i dri bzang po'i chus khrus gsol nas 'khar ba'i snod na gnas pa'i shi ri sha dang au dum b'a ra dang pa da dang par ka dra'i phye mas gtsub par byas la /
analyzed: las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i dri bzang po'i chus khrus gsol nas 'khar ba'i snod na gnas pa'i shi ri sha dang au dum b'a ra dang pa da dang par ka dra'i phye mas gtsub par byas la /
translated: Having bathed with all-activity [mantra]-enchanted fragrant water, rub [the image] with the powder of śirīṣa, udumbara, pāda, and paraka wood placed in an iron vessel.

original: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes pa brjod cing 'khar ba'i snod na gnas pa'i dri bzangs dang / mar khus byugs te /
analyzed: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes pa brjod cing 'khar ba'i snod na gnas pa'i dri bzangs dang / mar khus byugs te /
translated: Recite Om hum tram hrīḥ āḥ and rub [the image] with the fragrant water and ghee placed in an iron vessel.

original: slar yang gtsub par byas la ;
analyzed: slar yang gtsub par byas la ;
translated: Rub again.

original: 'khar ba'i snod na gnas pa'i skyu ru ras byugs la /
analyzed: 'khar ba'i snod na gnas pa'i skyu ru ras byugs la /
translated: Rub with the emblic myrobalan placed in an iron vessel.

original: bkrus nas 'khar ba'i snod na gnas pa'i yung bas byug cing bkrus te /
analyzed: bkrus nas 'khar ba'i snod na gnas pa'i yung bas byug cing bkrus te /
translated: Having washed, anoint with turmeric that is in a metal container and wash.

original: shr'i khanda dang tsandan la sogs ji ltar tshogs pas byugs te /
analyzed: shr'i khanda dang tsandan la sogs ji ltar tshogs pas byugs te /
translated: Anoint with whatever is available, such as shari khaṇḍa, sandalwood, and so on.

original: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa @74b dang lha mo rnams kyi bum pas khrus byas pa'i bsams pas /
analyzed: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa @74b dang lha mo rnams kyi bum pas khrus byas pa'i bsams pas /
translated: Having invited the tathāgatas and goddesses with light rays from the seed syllable in the heart, imagine that they wash with the vases.

original: bkra shis kyi glu dang rol mo la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i chu dung chos sam gzhan du blugs pa rnams kyis ji ltar bltams pa zhes pa la sogs pa brjod cing khrus bya'o //
analyzed: bkra shis kyi glu dang rol mo la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i chu dung chos sam gzhan du blugs pa rnams kyis ji ltar bltams pa zhes pa la sogs pa brjod cing khrus bya'o //
translated: With auspicious songs, music, and so on, wash with water from the victorious vase and so on, poured into a conch or another vessel, reciting “Just as when the gods bathed him…” and so on.

original: de nas de la gos pa'i chu gos 'jam pos phyi nas ji ltar nus pa'i gos la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te /
analyzed: de nas de la gos pa'i chu gos 'jam pos phyi nas ji ltar nus pa'i gos la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te /
translated: Then, dry him with a soft cloth and adorn him with whatever garments and so on are available.

original: rab tu gnas par bya ba'i ye shes sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la /🔽mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod nas pus mo g-yon pa sa la btsugs te /
analyzed: rab tu gnas par bya ba'i ye shes sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la / mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod nas pus mo g-yon pa sa la btsugs te /
translated: The wisdom beings who are to be established and the deities such as the buddhas and bodhisattvas are invited into the space in front with light rays from the seed syllable in one's heart.🔽Having made offerings with water for drinking and so forth, one kneels on the left knee.

original: g-yon pas dril bu 'khrol zhing g-yas pas spos phor bzung ste /
analyzed: g-yon pas dril bu 'khrol zhing g-yas pas spos phor bzung ste /
translated: Ringing the bell with the left hand and holding the incense holder with the right hand, recite:

original: aom h'um badzra dzi hv'a /
analyzed: aom h'um badzra dzi hv'a /
translated: oṃ hūṃ vajra jīhva🔽Homage and praise to the supreme vajra of the Bhagavān,

original: bcom ldan che ge rdo rje mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: bcom ldan che ge rdo rje mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: king of knowledge.

original: mgon po brtse ba'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: mgon po brtse ba'i rang bzhin can //
translated: Protector, whose nature is loving kindness,

original: khyed kyis rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal //
analyzed: khyed kyis rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal //
translated: I wish to perform the consecration.🔽For the sake of compassion for the disciples,🔽for the sake of making offerings to you,🔽for the sake of increasing the merit of sentient beings,

original: slob ma rnams la brtse don dang // khyed rnams la ni mchod phyir dang // sems can bsod nams spel don dang // byang chub sems ni 'byung phyir yang //
analyzed: slob ma rnams la brtse don dang // khyed rnams la ni mchod phyir dang // sems can bsod nams spel don dang // byang chub sems ni 'byung phyir yang //
translated: and for the sake of generating bodhicitta,

original: de la bdag gus bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: de la bdag gus bcom ldan 'das //
translated: I respectfully request the Bhagavān🔽to enter this receptacle.

original: bka' drin dag ni mdzad par 'os //
analyzed: bka' drin dag ni mdzad par 'os //
translated: You are worthy of being honored.

original: bdag la yang dag dgongs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: bdag la yang dag dgongs sangs rgyas //
translated: Buddhas, please consider me.🔽I will perform the consecration

original: 'gro ba'i 'khor lo bya don stsol //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i 'khor lo bya don stsol //
translated: For the sake of the world.🔽Bodhisattvas, those who abide in the result,🔽And other mantra deities,🔽Gods and world protectors,

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang // gang gzhan sngags kyi lha rnams dang // lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang // 'byung po rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnas //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang // gang gzhan sngags kyi lha rnams dang // lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang // 'byung po rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnas //
translated: And beings who abide in perfect enlightenment,🔽Sentient beings who delight in the teachings,

original: sems can bstan la mngon dga' dang // gang gzhan lha yi spyan mnga' rnams //
analyzed: sems can bstan la mngon dga' dang // gang gzhan lha yi spyan mnga' rnams //
translated: And others who possess the divine eye,

original: bdag ni che ge rdo rje che //🔽che ge yi ni rab gnas dag / bgyid 'tshal de phyir khyed rnams ni //
analyzed: bdag ni che ge rdo rje che // che ge yi ni rab gnas dag / bgyid 'tshal de phyir khyed rnams ni //
translated: I am so-and-so Vajra,🔽Dwelling in such-and-such a place.🔽I wish to perform the consecration, therefore it is fitting for you

original: nye bar byon par mdzad par 'os //
analyzed: nye bar byon par mdzad par 'os //
translated: To come near.

original: zhes lan gsum brjod do //
analyzed: zhes lan gsum brjod do //
translated: Say this three times.🔽For the sake of consecration,

original: rab tu gnas pa'i don dang / lhag par gnas pa'i don dang / nye bar byon par gsol ba btab la /
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa'i don dang / lhag par gnas pa'i don dang / nye bar byon par gsol ba btab la /
translated: For the sake of abiding, and for the sake of requesting to come near,

original: yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'tshal te bstod nas /
analyzed: yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'tshal te bstod nas /
translated: Make offerings, prostrate, and praise.

original: aom badzra pu na r'a ga ma na ya mu: zhes pas gshegs par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra pu na r'a ga ma na ya mu: zhes pas gshegs par bya'o //
translated: With Oṃ vajra puṇarāgamaya muḥ, they should be sent off.

original: khrus byas pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa'i @75a * //
analyzed: khrus byas pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa'i @75a * //
translated: Having bathed the image, etc.,

original: snying ga dang spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang gtsug tor la kun du byugs la las thams cad pa'i sngags brjod cing lag pa g-yas pas lan gsum reg ste rang gi sngags ji lta ba bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: snying ga dang spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang gtsug tor la kun du byugs la las thams cad pa'i sngags brjod cing lag pa g-yas pas lan gsum reg ste rang gi sngags ji lta ba bzlas par bya'o //
translated: anoint the heart, head, throat, and crown with the mantra of all activities, touch with the right hand three times, and recite one's own mantra as appropriate.

original: phyogs skyong gi gtor ma yang dbul bar bya'o zhes pa lhag par gnas pa'o ;
analyzed: phyogs skyong gi gtor ma yang dbul bar bya'o zhes pa lhag par gnas pa'o ;
translated: Also, offer the bali of the direction protectors. This is the preparatory rite.

original: / de nas snga dro khrus kyi stegs bu de nyid las sngar bzhin 'dus byas nas /
analyzed: / de nas snga dro khrus kyi stegs bu de nyid las sngar bzhin 'dus byas nas /
translated: Then, in the morning, having assembled as before on the bathing platform,

original: dge ba yud tsam la sogs pa la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku'i slob dpon shes rab dang bcas pa nye bar 'dug ste /
analyzed: dge ba yud tsam la sogs pa la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku'i slob dpon shes rab dang bcas pa nye bar 'dug ste /
translated: the vajra-holding master of the body, together with wisdom, should sit in a virtuous moment, etc.

original: sngon du gtor ma byin la stong pa nyid kyi rjes la sku gzugs la sogs pa dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms nas sngar bzhin khrus dang byur bsal ba brjod ma thag pa'i bdud rtsi lnga byug pa dang chus phyi ba'i mthar thug pa rnams
analyzed: sngon du gtor ma byin la stong pa nyid kyi rjes la sku gzugs la sogs pa dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms nas sngar bzhin khrus dang byur bsal ba brjod ma thag pa'i bdud rtsi lnga byug pa dang chus phyi ba'i mthar thug pa rnams
translated: Having previously given a torma, after emptiness, one should visualize the form of the pledge-being, such as the form of the deity, and perform the bathing and anointing as before, up to the smearing with the five elixirs and wiping with water.

original: bya ste / dkyil 'khor gyi khang par bcug la dkyil 'khor mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas /
analyzed: bya ste / dkyil 'khor gyi khang par bcug la dkyil 'khor mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas /
translated: Having placed the deity in the maṇḍala house, one should place it facing the maṇḍala.

original: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bar brjod ma thag pa'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bar brjod ma thag pa'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: Having blessed the eyes, and so on, one should recite the previously mentioned mantra, “Oṃ namo bhagavate” up to “oṃ vajra puṣpe…,” and invite the gnosis being.

original: nye bar byon par mdzad par 'os //
analyzed: nye bar byon par mdzad par 'os //
translated: It is suitable to come near.

original: zhes pa'i bar lan gsum brjod de /
analyzed: zhes pa'i bar lan gsum brjod de /
translated: One should recite this three times.

original: dam tshig sems dpa' la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug cing ro gcig tu byas nas dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa' la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug cing ro gcig tu byas nas dbang du bya'o //
translated: Having caused the gnosis being to enter the pledge being, and having made them one taste, one should control them.

original: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams la /
translated: Then, light rays from the seed syllable in one's heart invite the tathāgatas of the ten directions and the goddesses such as Locanā.

original: rdo rje can gyis 'gro bskyab phyir / sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ni //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyis 'gro bskyab phyir / sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ni //
translated: With the verse “The buddhas confer empowerment upon Vajrī in order to protect migrating beings.

original: yon tan 'byung gnas byin ji ltar //
analyzed: yon tan 'byung gnas byin ji ltar //
translated: Just as the source of good qualities gave the name,

original: de bzhin 'di la sbyin par mdzod //
analyzed: de bzhin 'di la sbyin par mdzod //
translated: so please grant it to this one as well.”

original: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba gdab cing //
analyzed: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba gdab cing //
translated: One should request with this verse.

original: de rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyi lam nas rang gi lus la bcug ste /
analyzed: de rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyi lam nas rang gi lus la bcug ste /
translated: Those [empowerments] enter one’s body through the path of Vairocana.

original: shes rab dang snyoms par zhugs pa chags pa chen pos zhu bar byas nas rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon pa de'i zhu bas rang gi kha nas zhugs pa lha mo'i padmar bzhag pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa la dbang bskur zhing padma las phyir 'thon te /
analyzed: shes rab dang snyoms par zhugs pa chags pa chen pos zhu bar byas nas rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon pa de'i zhu bas rang gi kha nas zhugs pa lha mo'i padmar bzhag pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa la dbang bskur zhing padma las phyir 'thon te /
translated: Through the melting of the great passion of the union with the wisdom [consort], [the bodhicitta] exits through the vajra path. The form of the bodhicitta that exits is conferred upon the image and so on, which is placed in the lotus of the goddess, through one’s mouth.

original: slar phyag dang zhal la sogs pa'i gzugs can de rnams kyis padma las 'thon pa la slar bkra shis kyi glu la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i @75b dbang bskur bar bsgom zhing /🔽yal ga dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dang ldan pa'i lag pa g-yas par bzung ba dang rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i chu byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi'i tshul gyis ji ltar bltams pa zhes pa la sogs pa dang / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa dang /
analyzed: slar phyag dang zhal la sogs pa'i gzugs can de rnams kyis padma las 'thon pa la slar bkra shis kyi glu la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i @75b dbang bskur bar bsgom zhing / yal ga dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dang ldan pa'i lag pa g-yas par bzung ba dang rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i chu byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi'i tshul gyis ji ltar bltams pa zhes pa la sogs pa dang / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa dang /
translated: Then, those forms of the hands, faces, and so on, emerge from the lotus, and again the consecration is imagined, preceded by the song of auspiciousness, and so on.🔽 Holding the right hand with the vajra and branches, and the water of the victorious ones, and so on, in the manner of the elixir of the spirit of enlightenment, just as the consecration with “just as was consecrated…” and so on, and “oṃ sarva tathāgata abhiṣekasa maya śrīye hūṃ svāhā,”🔽and “oṃ vajra uḍaṅka abhiṣiñca hūṃ,” and so on, and the consecration is performed with firm imagination of the consecration by the principal of the maṇḍala, the blessed Vajrasattva alone.

original: aom badzra au da ka aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes pa yang brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kho nas dbang bskur ba'o zhes lhag par mos pa brtan pas dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes pa chu'i dbang ngo //
analyzed: aom badzra au da ka aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes pa yang brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kho nas dbang bskur ba'o zhes lhag par mos pa brtan pas dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes pa chu'i dbang ngo //
translated: The water consecration.

original: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes pa 'dis cod ban bskon par bya'o zhes pa cod pan gyi'o //
analyzed: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes pa 'dis cod ban bskon par bya'o zhes pa cod pan gyi'o //
translated: This is the diadem.

original: sngar bzhin thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kho na'i lhag par mos pa'o //
analyzed: sngar bzhin thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kho na'i lhag par mos pa'o //
translated: As before, one should imagine that the Blessed One alone is everywhere.

original: 'di nyid la sku gzugs la sogs pa'i dpral bar dar bcing ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid la sku gzugs la sogs pa'i dpral bar dar bcing ba'o //
translated: Here, one should tie a ribbon on the forehead of the image, etc.

original: de ring zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas rdo rje 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa rdo rje'i'o //
analyzed: de ring zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas rdo rje 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa rdo rje'i'o //
translated: With the verse Today, etc., one should induct into the vajra-holder. This is the vajra.

original: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
analyzed: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
translated: One should say Om vajra-adhipati-satva abhisincasva iti stha vajra-samaya satva,

original: zhes brjod cing dril bu 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa dril bu'i'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod cing dril bu 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa dril bu'i'o //
translated: and induct into holding the bell. This is the bell.

original: aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta:/
analyzed: aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta:/
translated: One should say Om vajra-satva-satva abhisincasva vajra-nama-abhishekataḥ,🔽 and give the name. This is the name.

original: aom badzra satva zhes pa brjod cing ming gdags par bya'o zhes pa ming ngo //
analyzed: aom badzra satva zhes pa brjod cing ming gdags par bya'o zhes pa ming ngo //
translated: One should say Om vajra-satva,

original: sku gzugs la sogs pa rdo rje dang ; rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ye shes kyi phyag rgya la 'khyud pa rnam par bsgoms te /
analyzed: sku gzugs la sogs pa rdo rje dang ; rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ye shes kyi phyag rgya la 'khyud pa rnam par bsgoms te /
translated: One should visualize the form, etc., with two hands holding a vajra and a vajra bell, embracing the gnosis consort.

original: chu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang bskur zhing rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab pa bltas nas /
analyzed: chu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang bskur zhing rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab pa bltas nas /
translated: One should confer initiation with the rite of conferring the water initiation, and one should see the seal of the lord of the family.

original: lhag ma de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de nyid du bcug la /🔽aom su pra tishtha badzra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: lhag ma de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de nyid du bcug la / aom su pra tishtha badzra sv'a h'a /
translated: One should place the remainder of the water in the vessel of the tathāgatas, etc.🔽One should consecrate it with the mantra, “Oṃ supratiṣṭha vajra svāhā.”

original: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes pa slob dpon no //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes pa slob dpon no //
translated: This is the master.

original: rigs kyi bdag po 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi sku rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rig ma dang bcas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas zhugs te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bdag po 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi sku rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rig ma dang bcas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas zhugs te /
translated: The lord of the family is Cakrin, the lord of the wheel, Vajrasattva. The assembly of tathāgatas, such as Vairocana, etc., invited by the light rays of the seed syllable in one’s heart, together with the knowledge women, enter through the mouth of Vairocana.

original: zhu bar gyur cing bde ba chen pos rjes su myangs te /
analyzed: zhu bar gyur cing bde ba chen pos rjes su myangs te /
translated: Having melted, they are savored by great bliss.

original: rdo rje dang padma dag las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin sku gzugs la sogs pa'i zhal du 'jug par bsam par bya'o zhes pa gsang ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma dag las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin sku gzugs la sogs pa'i zhal du 'jug par bsam par bya'o zhes pa gsang ba'o //
translated: One should imagine that the nature of bodhicitta, which arises from the vajra and lotus, enters the mouth of the image, and so forth. This is the secret.

original: de nas @76a * //
analyzed: de nas @76a * //
translated: Then,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' des gtad pa'i lha mo dang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i lha rnams snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' des gtad pa'i lha mo dang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i lha rnams snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: the deity, such as the image, and so forth, who is the goddess appointed by Vajrasattva, enter into union.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin du lhag par mos pa bya'o zhes pa dbang bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin du lhag par mos pa bya'o zhes pa dbang bzhi pa'o //
translated: One should imagine that they are the nature of innate joy. This is the fourth empowerment.

original: de nas lha'i snying po'i sngags kyis gos la sogs pa'i mchod pa phul te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i snying po'i sngags kyis gos la sogs pa'i mchod pa phul te /
translated: Then, having offered the worship of cloth, and so forth, with the mantra of the essence of the deity,

original: dam tshig gi rdzas dang gi wang yang byin nas /
analyzed: dam tshig gi rdzas dang gi wang yang byin nas /
translated: and having given the pledge substance and the eye ointment,🔽one should show the mirror with the mantra Oṃ vajrasattva aḥ.

original: aom badzra satva a'a: zhes pa'i sngags kyis me long bstan la sbyin bdag la sogs pa dang mngon par 'dod pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i don du /
analyzed: aom badzra satva a'a: zhes pa'i sngags kyis me long bstan la sbyin bdag la sogs pa dang mngon par 'dod pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i don du /
translated: For the sake of the desired aims, such as pacifying, and so forth, of the patron, and so forth,

original: m'a sha ka las mi chung ba'i gser gyi thur ma dngul gyi snod na gnas pa'i mar dang sbrang rtsi bskus pa yis aom tsakshu tsakshu sa manta tsakshu ra bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
analyzed: m'a sha ka las mi chung ba'i gser gyi thur ma dngul gyi snod na gnas pa'i mar dang sbrang rtsi bskus pa yis aom tsakshu tsakshu sa manta tsakshu ra bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
translated: With a golden spoon not smaller than a māṣa, anointed with butter and honey in a silver vessel, recite:🔽Oṃ cakṣubh cakṣubha samanta cakṣuḥ viśodhani svāhā.

original: zhes brjod cing mig 'byed pa'i bsam pas mig sman bskus nas /
analyzed: zhes brjod cing mig 'byed pa'i bsam pas mig sman bskus nas /
translated: With the thought of opening the eyes, apply the eye medicine.

original: sbyin bdag la sogs pa zhi ba la sogs pa'i don du mchog tu gzigs par mos par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin bdag la sogs pa zhi ba la sogs pa'i don du mchog tu gzigs par mos par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the patron and so forth are seen supremely for the sake of pacifying and so forth.

original: de nas sbyin sreg gi thab kyi me'am de med na gzhan du yang manji la gnas pa'i snod du 'o ma dang 'bras ma grugs pa dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra rnams bsras te /
analyzed: de nas sbyin sreg gi thab kyi me'am de med na gzhan du yang manji la gnas pa'i snod du 'o ma dang 'bras ma grugs pa dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra rnams bsras te /
translated: Then, in the fire of the burnt offering hearth or, if that is not available, in another place as well, in a vessel placed on a stove, boil together milk, unhusked rice, butter, honey, and sugar.

original: rang gi bdag po'i sngags khengs pa dang bcas par brjod cing 'o thug bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: rang gi bdag po'i sngags khengs pa dang bcas par brjod cing 'o thug bsgrubs nas /
translated: Recite one’s own lord’s mantra with pride and prepare the milk and rice.

original: aom di byanne sa m'a dhi dhya na pr'i na ne sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom di byanne sa m'a dhi dhya na pr'i na ne sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ divyaṃ samādhi dhyāna prīṇane svāhā.

original: zhes pa mngon par bsngags shing brjod de /
analyzed: zhes pa mngon par bsngags shing brjod de /
translated: Recite this mantra.

original: sku gzungs la sogs pa la mngon sum du'am /
analyzed: sku gzungs la sogs pa la mngon sum du'am /
translated: In front of a painting or statue, or in front of a reflection, offer the washing of the face,

original: gzugs brnyan la gsol du bcug la zhal bsil dang / t'am bu la yang phul nas /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan la gsol du bcug la zhal bsil dang / t'am bu la yang phul nas /
translated: and also the tāmbūla,🔽and recite Oṃ hūṃ traṃ hrīḥ aḥ, so that they hear the pledge.

original: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes pa dam tshig thos par byas nas me tog la sogs pa nye bar phul la thal mo sbyar te ;
analyzed: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes pa dam tshig thos par byas nas me tog la sogs pa nye bar phul la thal mo sbyar te ;
translated: Having offered flowers and so forth, place one’s palms together,

original: ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
analyzed: ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
translated: and recite the verse “Just as all perfect buddhas.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing /
translated: . . . ,” and so forth.

original: yun ring du bzhugs par gsol ba btab nas /
analyzed: yun ring du bzhugs par gsol ba btab nas /
translated: Having supplicated them to remain for a long time,

original: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i smad dang bar dang ro stod kyi cha lag pa g-yas pa rol pa'i rdo rje lan gsum bskor te /
analyzed: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i smad dang bar dang ro stod kyi cha lag pa g-yas pa rol pa'i rdo rje lan gsum bskor te /
translated: rotate one’s right hand, the vajra of enjoyment, three times over the lower, middle, and upper parts of the body of the painting and so forth.

original: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags dang / mi bskyod pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bstod la /

analyzed: shin tu ring ba ma yin pa gzhan pa lang gi rna ba lta bu rnams kyis te /

analyzed: shar la sogs pa ni sgrub pa po'i kha lta ba la ltos nas so //

analyzed: de'i dbus su stong ba nyid de /

analyzed: zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa zhal so so la spyan gsum pa /

original: lhag ma @78a * //
analyzed: lhag ma @78a * //
translated: The remaining

analyzed: sma ra dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan zhing rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab pa /
translated: He is endowed with a garland of light rays of consciousness and is sealed by the lord of the family.

original: sku mdog dang rgyan las dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: sku mdog dang rgyan las dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: His color and ornaments are in accordance with his activity.

original: de la yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po nyid la g-yas g-yon gyi zhal nag po dang dmar po'o //
analyzed: de la yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po nyid la g-yas g-yon gyi zhal nag po dang dmar po'o //
translated: In that case, the color of all the limbs and the principal face is white, with the right and left faces black and red.

original: ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu nyid la sngon po dang dkar po'o //
analyzed: ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu nyid la sngon po dang dkar po'o //
translated: In the case of yellow, red, and green, they are blue and white.

original: sngon po nyid la dkar po dang dmar po'o //
analyzed: sngon po nyid la dkar po dang dmar po'o //
translated: In the case of blue, they are white and red.

original: snying gar sa bon ram dang bcas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par bsams nas /
analyzed: snying gar sa bon ram dang bcas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par bsams nas /
translated: In the heart, one should visualize the pledge-being, which is consecrated by the fire mandala with the seed syllable raṃ.

original: de'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyus dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa'i me lha me'i phyogs kyi nam mkhar spyan drang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyus dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa'i me lha me'i phyogs kyi nam mkhar spyan drang bar bya ste /
translated: The hook of light rays from the seed syllable at his heart invites the fire god, who is like the gnosis being, the pledge being.
